hero.description: Hana combines Translation, Summarization, Chat AI, and Document Management in one extension. Boost productivity with project management, team collaboration, and advanced AI models.

howItWorks.title: How Does Hana Work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Just 3 simple steps to start browsing smarter. No complex setup required - Hana handles everything automatically for you.

step1.title: Install the Extension
step1.description: Add Hana to Chrome with just one click from the Chrome Web Store. Completely free, no registration required, no email needed. The extension is super lightweight and won't slow down your browser.

step2.title: Use When Needed
step2.description: Right-click to translate or summarize selected text. Open the side panel to chat with AI, manage projects, upload documents, and access all of Hana's powerful features.

step3.title: Get Smart Insights
step3.description: Click the Hana icon anytime to see a summary of the current page, content insights, and AI-personalized suggestions. You can also ask Hana anything about what you're reading.

dashboard.title: Powerful Analytics Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Comprehensive tracking of your browsing habits. View detailed time saved through AI summaries, number of articles read, frequently visited websites, and weekly/monthly productivity analysis. Set personal goals and track your progress.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Complete AI productivity platform for professional work

feature1.title: AI Translation & Summarization
feature1.description: Translate text to 20+ languages with advanced AI models. Summarize long articles in 3 styles (Brief, Balanced, Detailed). Auto-detect language and context-aware translations with glossary support.

feature2.title: AI Chat With Context Awareness
feature2.description: Chat about any content on the web. AI assistant understands your context, remembers conversation history, and can answer based on documents in your project.

feature3.title: Project & Document Management
feature3.description: Organize work by separate projects. Upload and manage documents (PDF, DOC, MD), semantic search with AI, and share with team members. Import from Notion and Google Sheets.

feature4.title: Effective Team Collaboration
feature4.description: Invite members to projects, assign roles (owner, editor, viewer), share translations and summaries. Admin panel to manage teams and track usage statistics.

feature5.title: Multi-Model AI Support
feature5.description: Choose from multiple AI models (GPT-4, etc.) based on your needs. Each model is optimized for different tasks: translation accuracy, summarization quality, or generation speed.

feature6.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
feature6.description: JWT authentication with access/refresh tokens, role-based access control, session management. HTTPS API calls with end-to-end encryption, and regularly audited codebase.

cta.title: Ready to Upgrade Your Browser?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who have transformed the way they interact with the web. Start saving 2 hours every day today.

privacy.comparison: We never sell data to third parties and comply with international security standards

questions.isFreeAnswer: Yes! Hana is completely free. No hidden fees, no credit card required, and you can use it forever.
questions.dataProtectionAnswer: Data is encrypted end-to-end and transmitted via HTTPS. We use JWT authentication to protect accounts. We never sell data to third parties and comply with international security standards.
questions.browserSpeed: Does Hana slow down my browser?
questions.browserSpeedAnswer: Not at all! Hana uses under 50MB RAM and is optimized with background processing. You won't notice any slowdown.
questions.browsersAnswer: Hana works on Chrome, Edge, and all Chromium-based browsers like Brave, Arc, and Opera.
